column4: what is /dev/wacom ?  i get error "Error opening /dev/wacom : No such file or directory"  "(EE) xf86OpenSerial: Cannot open device /dev/wacom"  ?
There is a config for wacom graphics tablets in the default X config file, just in case you have one (but nothing for my aiptek tablet dammit!)
You must do it in the "Server" section too remember!
